bbc_urd_20090103.0008__4
this research has proven wrong the old saying that while suffering from fever it is better to abstain eating thatits starve during feverhas been by proved a disproven adage disproved axiom fast myth its talk decrease useful in very good feed cold belief when one of fasting wives tale less preventing increase decreased
